LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ConnectionTypeReadOnly: Read-Only: Just API Key + Channel ID (easy, reads chat only)
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ConnectionTypeReadWrit: Read+Write: API Key + OAuth (hard, can send messages, may require verification)
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ChannelIDDialogMessage:
This will open a tool to find your YouTube Channel ID.
Your Channel ID starts with 'UC' and is different from your channel name.
Open Channel ID Finder?
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ChannelIDTooltip: Required for both read-only and read+write modes Your unique YouTube Channel ID (starts with UC...) This is NOT your channel name or URL! Example: UC_x123y456z789 (24 characters)
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.APIKeyHelp: ðŸ’¡ API Key enables READ-ONLY chat reading
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.APIKeyPasteSuccess: API key pasted! You can now try read-only connection.
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.APIKeyDialogInstructio: 1. Go to Google Cloud Console 2. Create a project (or select existing) 3. Enable 'YouTube Data API v3' 4. Create credentials â†’ API Key 5. Copy the generated key 6. Paste it here This enables read-only chat access. Open Google Cloud Console?
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.APIKeyConfigured: âœ“ API Key configured - Ready for read-only mode
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.NoAPIKey: âš No API Key - Cannot connect to YouTube
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.APIKeyTooltip: YouTube Data API v3 Key Required for reading chat messages. Get this from Google Cloud Console. This is different from OAuth tokens! ðŸ”’ This key only allows reading chat, not sending messages.
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ConnectReadOnlyTooltip:
Connect to YouTube chat in read-only mode
You will be able to see chat messages but cannot reply
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.ConnectingMessage: Connecting to YouTube in read-only mode...
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.CannotConnectButton: Connect (Missing API Key or Channel ID)
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.CannotConnectTooltip:
Cannot connect - missing API Key or Channel ID
Configure basic settings above first
LanguageData.TabDrawer_YouTube.HighQuotaWarning: High usage - consider reducing polling frequency
